name: Anwesha CRM
overview:
Anwesha CRM makes sales and marketing automation and productivity software. Our flagship product is Saleswah CRM, an integrated platform for customer engagement, funnel creation and complete lead to order and quote to cash processes.

Saleswah is the online CRM Software for small business worldwide. Saleswah CRM helps manage your customer profiles and activities, manage teams and territories, grow sales and forecast with confidence.

Saleswah lets you manage the entire sales pipeline from first contact to close. It is an online CRM for small business worldwide that helps

  • manage, log and track sales processes and activities
  • find, attract, and win new customers
  • manage the entire sales life cycle
  • track sales pipeline by product, team, territory and executive.
  • run marketing campaigns for lead generation.

>>Saleswah takes the pain out of new contact addition in the CRM. >> Saleswah triggers a new sales lead automatically based on logged activity data >> Saleswah is easy to use and set up.

Saleswah is available in 3 types of licenses. Licenses start at $8 per user per month; from the 4th user onwards. Upto 3 users in a registered account get to use Saleswah for free.

All licenses have the ability to create unlimited contacts, sales opportunities, tasks and deep sales hierarchies by teams or territories.

  • All Saleswah accounts allow unlimited storage.
  • All Saleswah Licenses allow full bi-directional synchronization of Tasks and Contacts with Google Apps.

All sales leads and all tasks assigned to an executive are instantly sent to her on email and SMS.

Reports are online and instantly updated so that your team always knows the status of pending tasks or deals.
